phase_name: Prove Forward_F via Witness Graph Bridge
current_objective: Design non-constant BFMCS using witness graph

objectives.name: Analyze mathematical approach
objectives.notes: Deep analysis completed. The enriched chain approach CANNOT prove forward_F because F-formulas don't persist through GContent seeds. The witness graph proves F-witnesses exist locally but cannot directly serve as an Int-indexed BFMCS because GContent doesn't propagate between non-adjacent nodes.

objectives.name: Design non-constant BFMCS
objectives.notes: Need omega-squared construction or witness-graph-guided embedding that preserves both forward_G (GContent coherence) and forward_F (witness placement).

approaches_tried.result: Blocked. F(psi) at chain(0) does not guarantee F(psi) at chain(n) for the step n where psi's encoding fires. G(neg psi) can enter the chain at step 1 via Lindenbaum non-constructivity, killing F(psi) permanently.
approaches_tried.evidence: Mathematical analysis confirms F(phi) -> G(F(phi)) is NOT provable in TM logic. The F-dichotomy lemma (enrichedForwardChain_F_dichotomy) shows at each step either F(psi) or G(neg psi) is present, but we cannot control which.

approaches_tried.result: Blocked for forward_G. The witness graph is a DAG, not a chain. GContent only propagates along edges. For non-adjacent nodes i < j with no path between them, G(phi) at i does not guarantee phi at j.
approaches_tried.evidence: The witness graph edges are local (source -> witness). There's no guaranteed path between arbitrary pairs of nodes.

viable_approaches.description: At each outer step n, build an inner chain that processes ALL F-formulas present at step n. The inner chain uses the standard dovetail construction. This ensures every F-formula gets witnessed because the inner chain processes ALL formulas at a step where the F-formula is known to be present.

Build a linear chain from the root, but at each step, choose the next MCS to be the witness graph's next node (following a linearization of the DAG). Fill gaps with GContent extensions. This preserves forward_G (GContent coherence at every step) while using the witness graph's F-witness guarantees.
viable_approaches.confidence: MEDIUM (novel combination, may have unforeseen issues)
